post.author: 나수환
post.content:
저한테 온 이메일입니다. 관심있는분 연락하세요.



Dear Alex,

National Computer Professionals (NCP) is a team of dynamic and creative specialists providing a full range of consulting services to the Information Systems Industry. Our management team has over 25 years of combined experience as specialists in the recruitment and placement of information technology professionals. We have the expertise, training, and experience needed to assess and assist in selecting the best solution to meet the needs of our clients and consultants.

Job Description:
We are currently looking for a Programmer Analyst for a contract position in Toronto, Ontario Canada- 1year term- Rate $30-$33CAD per hour.

Our client is a large financial institution looking for a Programmer Analyst with IMS DB/DC, Cobol, CICS, VSAM expertise.




Robert Lombardi
National Computer Professionals
P.(416)221-0881 or (416)644-2777 or 1-877-721-0881
F.416-221-7273
www.ncp-it.com
post.title: 메인프레임
